attributes.action: Re-Open Bedford Road Aberdeen for All traffic, until an alternate solution found
attributes.background: Since the 3rd don crossing open city council restric the Traffic only for bus , it's made waste situations for locals , shoppers , school drop off & local business. So I urge the Aberdeen city council to reopen the road until beryden road extended

rejection.details:
Local roads are the responsibility of local councils, not the UK Government or Parliament. 

You can start a petition to Aberdeen City Council here:

http://www.aberdeencity.gov.uk/council_government/CommitteeServices/cs_petitions.asp
